summary: THE DRIVERS SEAT COMPLETELY DETACHED ITSELF CAUSING CONSUMERS DAUGHTER TO FALL BACKWARD.  CONSUMER RE-ATTACHED THE BOLTS AND THE DEFECT OCCURED AGAIN.  CONSUMER RE-ATTACHED THE BOLTS A SECOND TIME THIS TIME ADDING A LOCK WASHER TO THE BOLT AND SOME LOCKTITE ON THE THREADS.  CONSUMER WOULD LIKE THIS ISSUE TO BE LOOKED INTO.  *JG
